Create an invite

required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","example":5,"default":1,"description":"optional, for link invites"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"topic_id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"group_ids"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Optional, either this or `group_names`. Comma separated list for multiple ids.","example":"42,43"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"group_names"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Optional, either this or `group_ids`. Comma separated list for multiple names.","example":"foo,bar"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"expires_at"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"optional, if not supplied, the invite_expiry_days site setting is used"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
